search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for magicplan (magicplan.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.

extracted_content.content:
magicplan | Plans and Pricing
===============

This website stores cookies on your computer. These cookies are used to collect information about how you interact with our website and allow us to remember you. We use this information in order to improve and customize your browsing experience and for analytics and metrics about our visitors both on this website and other media. To find out more about the cookies we use, see our [Privacy Policy](https://help.magicplan.app/privacy-web)

If you decline, your information won’t be tracked when you visit this website. A single cookie will be used in your browser to remember your preference not to be tracked.

[Cookies settings](javascript:void(0);)

[Accept](javascript:void(0);) [Decline](javascript:void(0);)

[HELP CENTER How-to articles, guides, and product updates.](https://help.magicplan.app/)[ACADEMY Premium courses, certifications, and strategies.](https://www.magicplan.app/magicplanacademy)[WEBINARS Live and on-demand webinars.](https://community.magicplan.app/c/webinar?sort=asc)[COMMUNITY Connect with other magicplan users.](https://community.magicplan.app/)

**[INTEGRATIONS & API DOCUMENTATION](https://www.magicplan.app/integrations)**

Plans & Pricing

Simple, all-in pricing.  
No hidden fees.
=========================================

**Choose your ideal monthly project count** —start with 10 or go higher (12, 25, 38, etc.).

Stay in control: Update your monthly project count if needed.  **Unused projects** **rollover.**

Unexpected job?  **Add projects on demand.**

24 MONTH CONTRACT

**BEST PRICE**

$25 /project

[TALK TO AN EXPERT](https://www.magicplan.app/talk-to-sales)

12 MONTH CONTRACT

**MOST POPULAR**

$30 /project

[TALK TO AN EXPERT](https://www.magicplan.app/talk-to-sales)

MONTH-TO-MONTH

**MOST FLEXIBLE**

$40 /project

[BUY NOW](https://cloud.magicplan.app/login?period=month&license=pp.flex&quantity=10)

WHAT'S INCLUDED:
----------------

INSTANT FLOOR PLANS ON ANY DEVICE
---------------------------------

Even offline - never wait for sketches again.

COMPLETE JOB DOCUMENTATION
--------------------------

Photos, notes, 360 tours, contents, and equipment.

EDIT SKETCHES IN REAL-TIME
--------------------------

Edit plans anytime - no limits on sqft or extra fees.

ESX & FML FILES AVAILABLE IN SECONDS
------------------------------------

For faster and more efficient claims processing.

UNLIMITED USERS IN YOUR WORKSPACE
---------------------------------

Add as many users as you need to your account.

UNLIMITED CLOUD STORAGE
-----------------------

No storage limitations or extra charges, ever.

ONBOARDING & SUPPORT
--------------------

Top-notch onboarding & support, best in the industry.

AUTOMATIC PROJECT TOP-UPS
-------------------------

Never run out - your plan upgrades automatically.

**More than 60 jobs per month? Contact us for  custom solutions  tailored to your needs.**
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[Talk to sales](https://www.magicplan.app/talk-to-sales "Button Talk to sales")

### PRO ESTIMATOR

### $149/month

Billed monthly per user. Add to your existing magicplan PRO subscription.

**Create detailed estimates for T&M work or complex reconstruction projects.**

[TALK TO SALES](https://www.magicplan.app/talk-to-sales "Button TALK TO SALES")

[Learn more](https://www.magicplan.app/estimate/pro-plus "Button Learn more")

✔️ Instant Takeoff & Material Calculations  
✔️ Scope of Work  
✔️ Customizable Price Lists & Templates  
✔️ Comes with built-in Craftsman Book Price Books

![Image 3: magicplan Built-in Estimator - Mitigation estimate with drying equipment line items](https://www.magicplan.app/hubfs/new_estimator_magicplan.webp)

Ready to get started?
---------------------

[TALK TO SALES](https://www.magicplan.app/talk-to-sales "Button TALK TO SALES")

Frequently Ask Questions
------------------------

Do unused projects roll over to the next month?Yes, unused projects do roll over to the next month, allowing you to use them in the following billing cycle.

Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan at any time?Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time to better suit your needs. Changes will take effect at the start of your next billing cycle.

Is there a limit to the number of users on my account? No, all plans include unlimited users, allowing you to add as many team members as you need.

What happens if I exceed the number of projects included in my plan? If you exceed the number of projects in your plan, the extra project(s) will be automatically added to your account for $40 per project. Any overage will be automatically calculated and added to your billing for the next cycle, ensuring uninterrupted access to the additional projects you need.

[![Image 4: magicplan_logo_200x50](https://www.magicplan.app/hubfs/magicplan_logo_200x50.svg)](https://www.magicplan.app/)

With magicplan, restorers capture what counts instantly. Create real-time floor plans with your mobile device - no processing time for the fastest claim submissions.

RESOURCES

*   [Help Center](https://help.magicplan.app/)
*   [Integrations](https://www.magicplan.app/integrations)
*   [API Docs](https://apidocs.magicplan.app/)

COMPANY

*   [About us](https://www.magicplan.app/about)
*   [Contact us](https://www.magicplan.app/contact)
*   [Careers](https://www.magicplan.app/careers)

WANT TO LEARN MORE?

Schedule a call with a member of our sales team and learn what magicplan can do for your business.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is based on the number of projects per month with options for monthly, annual, and biennial contracts.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Best price option for long-term commitment.
